title: upload a file with the same name as another one is automatically renamed insteas of offering different options
body:
### expected behaviour
when i upload a file with the same name as another, i has to be asked whether i want to owerwrite, rename or cancel

### actual behaviour
when i upload a file with the same name as another, automatically itâ´s renamed

### steps to reproduce
1. being on the root folder, upload a file whose name is a.txt
2. once the file is uploaded, upload another one with the same name, a.txt
3. automatically, itâ´s uploaded as a (2).txt

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.19","versionstring":"5.0.11 rc2","edition":""}

### client configuration
browser: ff

operating system: mac

### logs

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
warning 	php 	opendir(/home/jvillafanez/src/owncloud/owncloud1/data/rperez@owncloud.com/cache/): failed to open dir: no such file or directory at /home/jvillafanez/src/owncloud/owncloud1/lib/files/storage/local.php#40 	2013-09-06t12:35:45+00:00
warning 	search_lucene 	failed to extract meta information for /jvillafanez@solidgear.com/files/hotelesing.doc: ms office (.doc, .xls, etc) parsing not enabled in this version of getid3() [1.9.3-20111213] 	2013-09-09t09:13:38+00:00
warning 	search_lucene 	failed to extract meta information for /jvillafanez@solidgear.com/files/hotelesing (2).doc: ms office (.doc, .xls, etc) parsing not enabled in this version of getid3() [1.9.3-20111213] 	2013-09-09t09:13:45+00:00
```
